.
<SelfClosingBlock attrs={1} />
.
createElement(SelfClosingBlock, { attrs: 1 })
.


.
<SelfClosingBlock
  attrs={1}
/>
.
createElement(SelfClosingBlock, {
  attrs: 1
})
.


.
<Block>
tags **can** be closed in

a subsequent
</Block>
.
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  "tags **can** be closed in a subsequent"
)
.


.
<Block>
  <Block>

</Block>
</Block>
.
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  createElement(Block, null)
)
.


.
<Block
  pass='something'
>

</Block>
.
createElement(Block, {
  pass: 'something'
})
.


.
<Block
</Block>
.
p({},
  "<Block",
  "</Block>",
)
.


.
<A>
  <B>
</A>
</B>
.
p({},
  "<A>",
  createElement(B, null,
    "</A>",
  ),
)
.


.
<A>
  <B>
</B>
.
p({},
  "<A>",
  createElement(B, null),
)
.
